column4: Can anyone help with my problem.  I have installed the os and I'm trying to figure out how to install ilife 06.  When I open the os it doesn't show the cd when I have it in the drive nor do I know how to copy the iso file ot the fack hdd?  Can someone tell me how to make this happen?
are you tring to install a mac package into ubunut?
iLife is designed to run on a mac, not on linux, it's not made for the linux operating system...
only if you have a power pc version of OSX installed in there and are installing the package into that
